Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland will look to keep its six-game win streak alive when the Cavaliers take on Golden State.
The Cavaliers are 10-3 on the road.
Golden State is 1-3 in one-possession games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers are 27-4, first in the Eastern Conference.
The Warriors are 16-15, 10th in the Western Conference.
The Cavaliers lead the Eastern Conference scoring 122.7 points per game while shooting 50.6%.
The Warriors are shooting 44.7% from the field this season, 0.9 percentage points lower than the 45.6% the Cavaliers allow to opponents.
The Cavaliers are shooting 50.6% from the field, 5.5% higher than the 45.1% the Warriors' opponents have shot this season.
Others: Dennis Schroder is averaging 16.4 points and 6.1 assists for the Warriors.
Donovan Mitchell is scoring 23.6 points per game and averaging 4.6 rebounds for the Cavaliers.
